DOC.brief_summary: This is a non-interventional retrospective data collection study from children aged from 2 to 12 years old diagnosed with an allergy and who received a treatment consisting of an H1-antihistamine. The period of last taken medication will be observed to evaluate the global satisfaction of the parents and physician for this last treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Treatment Satisfaction in Children With an Allergy and Who Received an Antihistamine
DOC.criteria: Children from 212 included History of allergy Used an Antihistamine within market authorization Child not yet treated for the presented allergy
